features: Ultimate Size & Comfort. The area of this oversized gel butt pillow (18" x 16" x 3") is 30% larger than other cushions on the market. It provides extra large gel cover to make you feel long-last cooling feeling. If you are a sedentary worker, it is recommended that you use this cushion.

Pressure Relief for Back, Sciatic, Tailbone. The ergonomic XL memory foam cushion with a slope design can provide good support for your thighs and help promote blood circulation. Its U-shaped cutout design relieves compressive pressure and pain on the coccyx. The gel cooling cushion offers you continuous, all-day sitting relief.

Enhanced Coolnesss. This desk chair cushion features 60% thicker gel blocks and 30% enlarged gel coverage than normal gel cushions on the market, ensuring exceptional freshness. Ideal for office, car seat or home use, this seat cushion provides superior cooling comfort anytime, anywhere.

Provide What You Want. The gel memory foam cushion adopts an anti-slip bottom to keep itself secure on the seat. Its breathable honeycomb fabric further prevents heat buildup, ensuring long-lasting coolness. You can rely on the designs of AUVON tailbone cushions.

Easy Maintenance Plus 2 Year Warranty. With an L-shaped smooth zipper and a washable cover, this sciatica cushion is easy for daily maintenance. With a hassle-free return policy and a 2-year warranty, we prioritize your satisfaction and peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is nice and thick, has the superior combination of gel AND memory foam, and is substantial. The cutout design totally eliminates pressure on your tailbone. Which is everything when your tailbone hurts. It's worth its weight in gold! It's very comfortable. Now, I'm not gonna lie, because of it's height, it can take some effort to get positioned properly on top of the cushion if you're sitting on a bed but once aboard, the payoff is more than worth the extra effort. This cushion is definitely not inexpensive but the old adage "you get what you pay for" certainly applies here. Well made, comfortable, and does what it's supposed to do. If you need a tailbone cushion, look no further, your search is over. This one is the one to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Coolness in your seat
reviews.reviewText: Okay so my pros of this are: it keeps you bottom cool while sitting, easy to open and set up... my con is it takes some time to warm up and conform to your body. which is not a bad thing for everyday use, but i purchased it for post op so it was not great for my use. I feel like for office chair or hard surface chairs it would work great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best product on the market!!!
reviews.reviewText: So I waited six months to write this review and when I tell you, it’s the best cushion believe me. I am a large woman, so I expected the cushion to go flat when I sat on it, or expected it not to give me comfort I was pleasantly wrong six months later this cushion hasn’t went flat. It keeps my butt cool it keeps me cool and I don’t have a sore butt when I get up and I sit at my desk 10 hours a day. So if you’re looking for great cushion, get this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can sit again!
reviews.reviewText: Sitting in my office chair was a horrible experience until I got this cushion (thanks to a medical problem). Its thick and heavy though, so probably not the best option if you need a highly portable option. I liked it enough that I'm ordering a second cushion for my home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too cold for me
reviews.reviewText: WellI’m returning this because I bought it to use this on my car seat and when it said “cooling” I didn’t think it meant “freezing”. I just received it last night and sat on it for a minute and literally I was shivering. Not my thing really but if you like to keep your hip area cold; this is a great item for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Solid product but didn't help with my issue
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because doc recommended for my senior mother who fell and broke her tailbone. The pillow is supposed to take pressure off. However, it was too hard for her to sit on and very uncomfortable even though it is a gel pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My butt loves me
reviews.reviewText: I have a desk job and I sit roughly 40 hrs a week. I should’ve bought this years ago.It’s super comfy for long periods, and it’s so good I bought more for the rest of my family.

Very soft but I found it quickly squished down to the point my tailbone was still having too much pressure on it and I am only about 112lbs! It does help but not the best if you have tailbone pain. I guess it is a partial help.
